action.text: SA 1957 fell when SA 1934 (Division I) was tabled.
Amendment SA 1957 proposed by Senator Feinstein to Amendment SA 1934 (Division I). (consideration: CR S8570-8571; text: CR S8570) To change the enactment date.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1957 proposed by Senator Feinstein to Amendment SA 1934 (Division I).
